////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// tilelist.txt

    This is a list of all the tiles in the dungeon16.bmp.  It could be
    used to determine what the images are supposed to be.  It is valid
    for version 116.

	VOID
	FLOOR
	WALL
	DOOR
	AVATAR
	LONGSWORD
	SHIELD
	GREENDRAGON
	PATH
	WATER

    This is a list of the mini-icons.  The very first icon is the
    character naked.  Note that the other icons are moved to certain
    attach points on the character when drawn.  Weapons are drawn
    in the left hand, sheilds in the right hand.  They are shifted and
    mirrored when worn in the opposite hand.

	NAKED
	HELM
	HAT
	BLUEROBE
	LEATHERTUNIC
	STUDDEDTUNIC
	CHAINTUNIC
	SWORD
	CLUB
	MACE
	REDSHIELD
	SANDALS
	BOOTS
	LEATHERHELM
	SILVERCIRCLET
	CRYSTALPLATE
	FEATHEREDHELM
	PLATEMAIL
	FLAMINGSWORD
	WARHAMMER
	SPEAR
	MIRRORSHIELD
	TOWERSHIELD
	WOODENSHIELD

	BUCKLER
	ROUNDSHIELD
	TORCH
	IRONSHOES
	POINTEDSLIPPERS
	RIDINGBOOTS
	WINGEDBOOTS
	STAFF
	POTION
	BOW
	GOLDCROWN
	CLOGS
	MINDACIDHAND
	BOOK
	SCROLL
	SHORTSWORD
	DAGGER
	KNIFE
	PEARLNECKLACE
	GOLDNECKLACE
	RUBYNECKLACE
	IRONTORC
	STUDDEDGORGET
	WAND

	LIGHTNINGRAPIER
	ICEMACE
	RAPIER
	EARTHHAMMER
	NAKEDPOISON
	NAKEDSTON
	... Unused ..

    The following is the mapping used in the alphabet file.  The extra
    lowercase 'a's are the special symbols.

	abcdefghij
	klmnopqrst
	uvwxyzaaaa
	ABCDEFGHIJ
	KLMNOPQRST
	UVWXYZaaaa
	0123456789
	!@#$%^&*()
	=-\',./+_|
	"<>?[]{}`~
	,.<>;:aaa 

    Symbols are, in order:
    
	HEART
	MAGIC
	NEXT
	DLEVEL

	LEFT
	RIGHT
	UP
	DOWN

	AC
	TRIDUDE
	CURSOR

    This is a list of the sprites.  These are used for cursors and for
    the action buttons at the bottom.  Note that they use their own
    palette independent from the other bitmaps.
	
	EQUIP
	DEQUIP
	DROP
	EAT
	BREATHE
	WALK
	LOOK
	QUAFF
	READ
	ZAP
	FIRE
	QUIVER
	HELP
	UNUSED
	DIP
	OPEN
	CLOSE
	HISTORY
	INVENTORY
	CLIMB
	PICKUP
	NAME
	FORGET
	MINIMAP
	
	NORTH
	SOUTH
	EAST
	WEST
	NORTHWEST
	NORTHEAST
	SOUTHEAST
	SOUTHWEST
	UP
	DOWN
	TEXT
	TILE
	CANCEL
	VOID
	CURSOR
	COMMAND
	PRAY
	SORT
	SLEEP
	SPLITSTACK
	JUMP
	SWAP
	VERBLIST
	OPTIONS

	RELEASE
	WAIT
	SEARCH
	EMPTYSLOT
	UNUSEDSPELL
	STICKYFLAMES
	MAGICMISSILE
